item.title: Hydropower Was Ecuador’s Answer to Climate Change. Until the Drought Hit.
item.description: An extraordinary drought has drained Ecuador’s rivers and reservoirs, leading to power outages of up to 14 hours. Some fear this is the beginning of a...

item.title: Syria’s Top Rebel Offers Hint of Timetable for Potetial Elections
item.description: Ahmed al-Shara, who led the rebel offensive that toppled Bashar al-Assad, offered little clarity on what the electoral process might look like.
